attributes.action: Impose a cap on immigration and stop mass immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: (Note to Number 10 this petiton was rejected because it was similar to a petition calling for a stop to immigration). This petiton is not calling for a stop to immigration, its calling for a CAP on immigration.  We the British public have had enough of our country being flooded with immigrants. We the British public want a cap on immigration to the UK. We want an end to mass immigration. SIn this petiton to ask for a cap.
